title: Endless American Wars, Anabaptism, Tom Holland, and Gandhi's Letters to Satan
description:
Plough is a publication by an Anabaptist community. To understand the word "Anabaptist" you need to know some church history because that word doesn't usually appear in church's names. The Anabaptists sort of scramble the facile alignment with how churches relate to the current American culture war making their comments on war, justice, Christianity and Empire more interesting than many conversations. A friend sent this podcast to me saying that Tom Holland said that Christianity was not in decline with the youth. That's because of how Tom Holland defines Christianity. So here we go.
